page_title_en: Grab A SteelSeries Gaming Headset For Only 35
page_description_en: Listen up, this is a really good deal on an easy holiday season gift.
page_text_html:
Now is a great time to grab a new gaming headset, as Black Friday sales usually see some of the biggest brands around offer big discounts on some of their best audio hardware. The SteelSeries Arctis 3 is one such example, as this $70 headset is just $35 right now.

See at Amazon

There are a few things to take note of, but for the level of design and audio quality on offer, this is a pretty good deal. A wired headset, you can use this on just about anything that has a 3.5mm jack input--which includes Xbox, PlayStation, PC, and Switch--and the S1 speaker drivers are engineered to produce ultra-low distortion audio.

For the microphone, there's a Discord-certified ClearCast setup that can keep your line of communication open with a bidirectional design that provides excellent noise cancellation. This should also be a comfortable headset to slip on, as the fabric cushions can easily support your ears while avoiding any unnecessary heat build-up.

Though there are more high-spec headsets available during Black Friday, few of them can match this particular SteelSeries when it comes to getting as much bang for your buck as possible. As a quick holiday season gift, this one looks superb and won't break your bank balance. For more savings, you can also check out the best Xbox Black Friday headset deals and the best PS5 headset options for the shopping event.

Best Black Friday Xbox Headset Deals
See More
